body.head.byline: By RONALD SMOTHERS; Compiled by John Sullivan

abstract.p: New Jersey Devils and Prudential Financial Inc reach $100 million agreement to name Newark hockey arena Prudential Center (S)

block.p: Newark's new hockey arena will be called the Prudential Center under an agreement announced yesterday by the New Jersey Devils and Prudential Financial Inc., the Newark-based financial services company. Prudential will pay about $100 million over 20 years under the terms of the agreement. The 18,000-seat, $375 million arena is scheduled to open in the fall.
